          <title>
            <string language="en">The three states of matter</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die drei Zustände des Stoffes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les trois états de matière</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os três estados da matéria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I tre dichiarano della materia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι τρεις καταστάσεις του θέματος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los tres estados de la materia</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration compares the degree of order/disorder, kinetic energy and intramolecular forces of solids, liquids and gases.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Disorder</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">intermolecular forces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">kinetic energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">liquids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Order</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solids</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">states of matter</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung vergleicht den Grad von 
order/disorder, von kinetischer Energie und von intramolekularen 
Kräften der Körper, der Flüssigkeiten und der Gase.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration compare le degré 
d'order/disorder, d'énergie cinétique et de forces 
intramoléculaires des solides, des liquides et des gaz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração compara o grau de 
order/disorder, de energia cinética e de forças intramolecular dos 
sólidos, dos líquidos e dos gáses.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione confronta il grado di 
order/disorder, di energia cinetica e di forze intramolecolari dei 
solidi, dei liquidi e dei gas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση συγκρίνει το βαθμό 
κατάταξης/αναταραχής, κινητικής ενέργειας και ενδομοριακών 
δυνάμεων των στερεών, των υγρών και των αερίων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración compara el grado de 
order/disorder, de energía cinética y de fuerzas intramoleculares de
sólidos, de líquidos y de gases.</string>
          </description>
